== Guidelines ==

Please submit your team logo ideas below.

* Format them like the example
* Keep them relevant
* Keep the size pretty small for the wiki (max width of 500 pixels)

'''REMINDER: Logo Submissions closes on 11 December, 2010.!'''

== Example ==

=== Your Name ===

A brief description of your logo.

{{http://ubuntuone.com/p/S49/}}

* A few reasons
* why we should use
* Your logo

Your@contact.info (how we can reach you)
